description: The IL-114-300, assembled from scratch, successfully took off in a joyful event for the country. This aircraft, unlike the previous one, is now in possession. The successful first flight marks a significant achievement, with plans already underway for the second aircraft.
original:
Forwarded from: Fighterbomber
Today a joyful event happened in our country.
The IL-114-300, assembled from scratch, took off completely.

The plane that made its first flight 3 years ago was “not real.”
And this one is ours.

So this is quite an event.
The second board is already being assembled.
Congratulations to everyone involved!🤝👍🍻

event: Cruise Missile Attacks in Lviv Region
description: Insider UAPhoto reports that Stryi was approached from both sides in the Lviv region, where cruise missiles attacked the same infrastructure facility as during previous raids on March 24 and 29. The attacks resulted in a dead person and the destruction of an administrative building with a fire.
original:
Insider UAPhoto, Stryi is approached from both sides. In the Lviv region, cruise missiles attacked the same infrastructure facility as during the raids on March 24 and 29, - head of OVA Kozitsky

There is a dead person. The administrative building was destroyed, there was a fire. Subscribe to Insider | Send content
